channel.title: [Pi]Commands Not Working[Pi]
channel.description: So i have commands such as ::givedonor and staff ranks (::givehelper ::giveadmin etc.) but none of them work ? When i compile i get 0 errors . idk what to do . Can someone please help me!

"::givedonor " is 10. we forgot the space . or atleast me . :palm:

ALL FIXED NOW THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE HELP . I COULDN’T OF DONE IT WITHOUT U GUYS . THANK YOU

the givedonor command was missing a brace, and there was an extra one at the end. So now they should work.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("giveadmin")) { try { String playerToPromote = playerCommand.substring(9); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToPromote)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been Promoted by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 7; c2.logout(); break; } } }

item.title: [Pi]Commands Not Working[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re just changing the index where the String cuts the text.
Ex:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemod")) { try { String playerToDemote = playerCommand.substring(7);
See how it says ".substring(7)"? The 7 is where the code is saying to cut the playerCommand string and turn it into a substring (a part of a string). the words "givemod" without spaces is 7 characters. Now try it on giveadmin. Also: "c2.sendMessage("You have been demoted by " + c.playerName);" I believe you're promoting :)

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi]Commands Not Working[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @jSiK jSiK
item.description:
@jSiK wrote:

::givemod

if (playerCommand.startsWith("givemod")) { try { String playerToDemote = playerCommand.substring(7); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToDemote)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been demoted by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 6; c2.logout(); break; } } }
::giveadmin

if (playerCommand.startsWith("giveadmin")) { try { String playerToDemote = playerCommand.substring(7); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerToDemote)) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.sendMessage("You have been demoted by " + c.playerName); c2.playerRights = 7; c2.logout(); break; } } }
What would I change ? It seems like it would work , they are the exact same just different player rights

Read full topic

item.title: [Pi]Commands Not Working[Pi]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

jSiK:

::givemod worked now but none of the others lol. i guess i could just copy and paste the ::givemod command and change mod to admin and change the character rights ?

Kind of, I believe they use String.substring(int) to get the second players name, so you will have to change the int within the paranthesis accordingly to the words (the words being givemod, giveadmin, etc)
